Package polyglot.frontend

Interface SourceLoader

All Known Subinterfaces:
FileManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExtFileManager
public interface SourceLoader
Interface for defining source file loader

  • Method Details

    • packageExists

      boolean packageExists​(java.lang.String name)
      Parameters:
      name - A package name
      Returns:
      true if a package name exists, otherwise false

    • packageExists

      boolean packageExists​(javax.tools.JavaFileManager.Location location, java.lang.String name)
      Parameters:
      location - A location to search a package name in
      name - A package name
      Returns:
      true if a package name exists, otherwise false

    • fileSource

      FileSource fileSource​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Obtains a FileSource for a dependency.
      Parameters:
      fileName - A source file name
      Returns:
      A FileSource if a source file fileName exists in source path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • fileSource

      @Deprecated FileSource fileSource​(java.lang.String fileName, boolean userSpecified) throws java.io.IOException
      Deprecated.
      Use fileSource(String, Source.Kind) instead.
      Parameters:
      fileName - A source file name
      userSpecified - If the user has specified this source file explicitly
      Returns:
      A FileSource if a source file fileName exists in source path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • fileSource

      FileSource fileSource​(java.lang.String fileName, Source.Kind kind) throws java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      fileName - A source file name
      kind - How the source was found
      Returns:
      A FileSource if a source file fileName exists in source path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • fileSource

      FileSource fileSource​(javax.tools.JavaFileManager.Location location, java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Obtains a FileSource for a dependency.
      Parameters:
      location - A location to search a source file in
      fileName - A source file name
      Returns:
      A FileSource if a source file fileName exists
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • fileSource

      @Deprecated FileSource fileSource​(javax.tools.JavaFileManager.Location location, java.lang.String fileName, boolean userSpecified) throws java.io.IOException
      Deprecated.
      Use fileSource(Location, String, Source.Kind) instead.
      Parameters:
      location - A location to search a source file in
      fileName - A source file name
      userSpecified - If the user has specified this source file explicitly
      Returns:
      A FileSource if a source file fileName exists
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • fileSource

      FileSource fileSource​(javax.tools.JavaFileManager.Location location, java.lang.String fileName, Source.Kind kind) throws java.io.IOException
      Parameters:
      location - A location to search a source file in
      kind - How the source was found
      userSpecified - If the user has specified this source file explicitly
      Returns:
      A FileSource if a source file fileName exists
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • classSource

      FileSource classSource​(java.lang.String className)
      Parameters:
      className - A class name
      Returns:
      A FileSource containing definition of the class className if it exists in source path, otherwise null

    • classSource

      FileSource classSource​(javax.tools.JavaFileManager.Location location, java.lang.String className)
      Parameters:
      location - A location to search a file in, that contains definition of the class className
      className - A class name
      Returns:
      A FileSource containing definition of the class className if it exists in location, otherwise null

    • caseInsensitive

      boolean caseInsensitive()
      Returns:
      true if the file system is case-insensitive, otherwise false.
